 double getRawScore()
          Returns the Raw Score which represents fraction of nodes of Graph1 that could be mapped to nodes in Graph2
 double getWeightedScore()
          Weighted fraction of number of nodes in G1 mapped to nodes in G2; Does not consider how closely are the nodes matched, once the value is above the specified threshold.
 double getWeightedSimScore()
          Score that serves as a similarity measure between G1 and G2 as it also considers how close are the two nodes that are mapped.

                                    double threshHold,
                                    double[] w)
Description copied from interface: PHomomorphism
Method to Calculate pHom Similarity Score between Graphs G1 and G2

Specified by:
calculatepHomSimScore in interface PHomomorphism
Parameters:
G1 - Adjacency Matrix Representation of Graph1
G2 - Adjacency Matrix Representation of Graph2
mappingScores - Matrix that stores Match scores for every node v in G1 to every node v' in graph V2
threshHold - value between 0-1 s.t. v-v' matches scoring above it will only be considered
w - An array that stores weights of the nodes in Graph 1
Returns:
weightedScore

getWeightedScore

public double getWeightedScore()
Description copied from interface: PHomomorphism
Weighted fraction of number of nodes in G1 mapped to nodes in G2; Does not consider how closely are the nodes matched, once the value is above the specified threshold.
